text: This is a list of Italian television related events from 1965. ==Events== *20 March - The 10th Eurovision Song Contest is held at the Sala di Concerto della RAI in Naples. Luxembourg wins the contest with the song "Poupée de cire, poupée de son", performed by France Gall. ==Debuts== ==Television shows== ==Ending this year== ==Births== *19 February - Veronica Pivetti, actress *1 April - Simona Ventura, TV host and X Factor judge *17 May - Claudia Koll, actress *10 August - Lorella Cuccarini, singer, TV host and actress ==Deaths== ==See also== *List of Italian films of 1965
title: 1965 in Italian television
